item.description:
This event is one in a continuing series of "Home Run In Harvard Square" events organized by the Cambridge Center For Adult Education. This year the Center is delighted to feature "Home Run In Harvard Square," a special celebration of baseball, the greatest of America's pastimes. This one-time only program will explore the history, art and science of the game.

The May 20 Program - Janet Marie Smith, architect for Fenway Park rennovations and Camden Yards Executive VP of Planning and Development, Baltimore Orioles

Tickets go on sale on February 16, 2010.

Please visit for more information and to purchase tickets. Or call 617-547-6789.

All proceeds from the seminar series and ticket sales will support CCAE's scholarships and public programming.

Events will be taking place in Harvard Square with Red Line access. $5.00 parking stickers for the Charles Hotel Garage are available at each event.

Additional events will be posted on the Red Sox Natives calendar.
item.name: "Designing The Great Ballparks" Home Run in Harvard Sq.
